basics.name: Harry Solsem
basics.label: Leadership | ISO27001 | Team Leader | Project Manager | Digital Product Development | Change Management | Enterprise Architect
basics.summary: With over 30 years of leadership experience, including technical and administrative roles in companies such as DNB, Riverty, Neonomics, and Sharecat Solutions. I have Leadership experience: Led teams of up to 50 employees, Managed full responsibility for personnel, budget, and results, provided leadership across multiple organizations. Key areas of expertise: Team leadership, Product development, IT project management. Notable Companies: DNB, Riverty, Neonomics, Sharecat Solutions
